text: “God fomɨra uan akam inigha izir gumaziba akar gavgavim me ganɨngizɨma, ezɨ ia men boriba mɨn ikɨ, egh akar gavgavir kabanang uaghan iana. God fomɨra Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir ian ovaviba ko ingarizɨma, ezɨ ia men boriba mɨn ikɨ, egh akar gavgavir dɨkɨrɨzir kam, a uaghan iana. God kamaghɨn Abraham mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, ‘Kɨ kamaghɨn damuam, nɨn ovavibar borimɨn tuavimɨn, kɨ nguazir kamɨn itir nguibaba bar deravɨra me damuam.’
